text: they just released the rules/guidelines, as far as I know there is no way to list your modules yet

Hi Roberto, it is not enabled yet. We have added the guidelines here: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/resources/what-are-the-module-requirements-for-the-marketplace> to give developers a head-start on creating modules within the guidelines.
Thanks, we already read that and we are ready to submit. Do you know when you will opening the submissions?
I am not sure of the exact date, but we are actively working on it.
